abstract: Friends and acquaintances remember Adam Purple, eccentric yet familiar presence for decades on Lower East Side, whose real name was David Wilkie; Wilkie died after collapsing on walkway on Williamsburg Bridge; was best known for creating garden on several abandoned lots on Forsyth Street.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Purple, whose real name was David Wilkie, was a familiar presence for decades on the streets of the Lower East Side, who spoke passionately about recycling and protecting the earth.

headline.main: Adam Purple, Eccentric Environmentalist and Gardener in New York, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Farewell to a Gardener and Eccentric Visionary

snippet: Mr. Purple, whose real name was David Wilkie, was a familiar presence for decades on the streets of the Lower East Side, who spoke passionately about recycling and protecting the earth.
